title: You are playing secret santa, and must get a gift for your favorite champion
body:
You are playing secret santa, and must get a gift for your favorite champion. What do you get them?

Example:
{{champion:86}} A portrait of Katarina, with a switch that quickly flips it to a portrait of the King should he ever have guests over.

http://24.media.tumblr.com/528b235c5f40683c4461c5de7614525c/tumblr_my30tnYvcB1rkkvqeo1_400.gif

replies.body:
{{champion:80}} A cookbook that focuses on baking recipes.
{{champion:14}} Uhh...A stress ball.
{{champion:41}} A check.
{{champion:420}} The kamasutra (I was drawing a blank!)
{{champion:104}} A cigar.

> {{champion:104}}  A cigar.

Rito be like:
http://i.imgur.com/zO8dEiW.gif?Noredirect

{{champion:81}} 

http://img.wikia.nocookie.net/intmap_tile_set_738/thumb/20140728092924%21phpwBA8KT.jpg/680x382x5-20140728092924%21phpwBA8KT.jpg

unfortunately that map is no longer valid though. So in other words:
{{champion:81}} You belong in a museum!

{{champion:81}}  $100 Amazon gift card.
{{champion:17}} $5 Amazon gift card.

{{champion:92}} A new Runeblade and a five year blade warranty plan.
{{champion:102}} A J4 pillow.

> {{champion:102}} A J4 pillow.

http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/GIF/2014/03/Oh-my-GIF.gif?gs=a
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
{{champion:143}} Fertilizer ;)
http://cdn.smosh.com/sites/default/files/bloguploads/60s-spiderman-meme-christmas.jpg

{{champion:268}} Kilograms of multi vitamin bird seed
{{champion:39}} Better Nerf Irelia T-shirt
{{champion:150}} A shubbanuffa and his favourite shagdovala
{{champion:32}} A friend
{{champion:157}} A fan, so he can face the wind whenever he wants
Buy {{champion:134}} a pack of batteries so she can have more power.
Eyes... {{champion:64}}
{{champion:64}} I don't see what you mean.
HE DIDN'T RESPOND WITH A GIF! BURN THE FALSE PROPHET!
Why would he respond with a gif if he can't see it?

{{champion:122}}
https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/21BA7FjKPzL.jpg
Why give garen a portrait when you can give the gift that matters most... JUSTICE

I tried, but I couldn't find anything more just than Garen himself
http://i.giflike.com/ph5FKPA.gif

{{champion:82}} ~~A picture of Pool Party Sona~~
A new Guitar

Well, a picture of his Iron Maiden would be pretty lame.

Plot twist.

She IS his Snowdown present!

{{champion:9}} Bird food.
{{champion:268}} Bird food.
{{champion:50}} Bird food.
{{champion:34}} Bird food.
{{champion:133}} Bird food.

My apologies for forgetting the last two _fine_ ladies~

\#TeamBirdIsTheWord

{{champion:432}} 
Conditioner. A lot of it.

{{champion:68}} I'm split between shitty anime goggles, a pair of platform shoes or a calendar full of Tristana's pictures (don't ask me where I found that, I still can't believe they sell it somewhere) and I've got only 7.24$. Decisions, decisions...

{{champion:121}} And maybe a large lantern.

From top to bot lane...

{{champion:114}} My heart.
